extensionDescription.message: Cleans cookies and local storage from Firefox containers.

clearDataCommand.description: Description for the clear data shortcut command.

setTimeFiveMinutes.description: Change the clear timespan to the last 5 minutes.

setTimeTwoHours.description: Change the clear timespan to the last 2 hours.

setTimeOneDay.description: Change the clear timespan to the last 24 hours.

setTimeEverything.description: Change the clear timespan to unlimited.

actionTitleDefault.description: Tooltip for the action button in the default state.

actionTitleConfirm.description: Tooltip for the action button when a further confirmation is required to clear data.

actionTitleDone.description: Tooltip for the action button immediately after data has been cleared.
